remarks: Construct lexicographic order on a function space based on a well-ordering of the indexes and a total ordering of the values. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement:
wemapso.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. A ( ( x ` z ) S ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. A ( w R z -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) } $.
wemapso $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ R We A /\ S Or B ) -> T Or ( B ^m A ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B x $.
$d R w x y z $.
$d S w x y z $.
